lead_paragraph: Heavy rains and floods have killed at least seven people and forced more than a million to leave their homes in the northeastern state of Assam.

headline.main: Deadly Floods in India Force 1.2 Million People From Homes

snippet: Heavy rains and floods have killed at least seven people and forced more than a million to leave their homes in the northeastern state of Assam....
abstract: Heavy rains and flooding force about 1.2 million people from their homes in northeastern Indian state of Assam and kill at least seven.
